impact-statement: The circadian clock in the model plant organism <italic>Arabidopsis thaliana</italic> is best described as a highly connected network made up of clock-regulated activators and repressors of transcription, rather than two coupled, repressor-based feedback loops.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
